title: Another Blow To Liverpool
description:
The FC crew react to the news that Liverpool will be without Luis Diaz for up to 8 weeks due to a knee injury and question how this absence will affect the Red's Top 4 challenge. Plus, the guys preview tomorrow's clash between AC Milan and Chelsea and reflect on Atletico Madrid and Barcelona finding a solution for Antoine Griezmann's future.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: Liverpool Lose Diaz For 8 Weeks; Potter on Pulisic's best position; Atleti, Barca resolve Griezmann dispute
